removed_yaml.description:
Configuring Simplepush using YAML has been removed.

Your existing YAML configuration is not used by Home Assistant.

Remove the Simplepush YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue.
removed_yaml.title: The Simplepush YAML configuration has been removed
